header.WeAreACreative: We are a creative digital agency
header.WeCreateIncredible: We create incredible digital products made for you, optimizing your business processes and saving resources

ourServices.InfoOurServices: At WebLeads we help you to adapt your company's business processes so that you can focus on what really matters to you, thus facilitating the achievement of your goals, providing added value to your customers, and increasing the productivity of your resources.
ourServices.DigitalSolutionInfo: Digital intelligence applied to your business
ourServices.UIDesignInfo: The secret to delivering the best user experience
ourServices.DedicatedTeamInfo: Being competitive in times of immediacy
ourServices.BusinessIntelligenceInfo: Bet on Business Intelligence and make the right decisions

HowWework.title: How we work
HowWework.element1: We apply Scrum as a work framework. It is a work methodology agile that aims to deliver value on the product in periods short periods of time and for this it is based on three pillars: transparency,inspection and adaptation.
HowWework.element2: Our creative process is based on the Design Thinking methodology, we want understand you and solve the real problems of your users. It is an iterative process   and non-linear, in which we will generate a large number of innovative ideas to address the complex challenges of real optimization of your procedures and resources.

customers.customerInfo: With more than 100 projects completed since 2016, these are some of the clients who work with us.

stack.stackInfo: Our development team is specialized in the use of modern technologies, safe, robust and with great performance in all types of projects of any size and objective .

column1.content: We have more than 12 years of experience working as a team, to take your company to the next level.
